Activity: Log in to the system, check emails and calendar.
Continue conducting training sessions for different departments as scheduled.
Gather feedback from the training session participants
Address questions and concerns raised by participants during the training sessions.
Compile all feedback received from training sessions and identify key themes and areas for improvement.
Draft a summary report outlining the progress made in informing hospital staff about the EHR project. Include key metrics such as the number of staff trained and feedback received.
Review the tasks completed during the week and plan for the upcoming week's activities.
Submit the summary report to senior management.
Respond to emails and complete any remaining tasks.
